description:
Let's face it, most history textbooks are as dry as a mouth full of saltine crackers. This problem has left thousands of people without a solid grasp of the events of American history. Well it's time to stop wrestling with those tiresome texts and time to pick up your tablet!

My course is a digitally forward-thinking account of the origins of the American Revolution, the events that led up to the war, the key players and major battles, and how it affected America's future. The course is meant to be accessible to both students and adults and will bring American history to life in a way that will help you excel not only on tests, but at your friend's dinner parties as well! You should take this course because not only does it utilize a visual mix of HD video, pictures, and sound effects, but it is broken down into bite-sized chunks that are humorous, informative, easily digestible, and don't take too much time out of your day. Get familiar with one of the most pivotal moments in our nation's history in a fun and lively manner.
title: The American Revolution
